operations.notes:
Creates a new Account using the given account data value. Accounts represent customers who wish to provide resources and users within a forum in order to allow users to reserve those resources.

Note: This operation may only be performed by System Administrators.

This operation requires an Account Data value.

This operation returns an Account Data value.

Note: The Forum marked as the Home Forum for the Account must exist before the Account can be created.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the requesting User does not have permissions to the requested Account Data or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Account Not Found

If the Forum identified as the Home Forum of the Account cannot be found, the following exception is returnd:

  • Not Found Exception if the Forum marked as the Home Forum for the Account cannot be found.

Invalid Account Information

If the Account details submitted do not include a valid license, or uses a non-unique name or other disqualifying attribute, or if the password provided for the account does not conform to the password policy required by the Home Forum, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Account Forum Exception if the Account details cannot be validated.
  • Password Exception if the Account password does not conform to the Home Forum password policy.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Search for accounts matching the given Criteria value.

Note: This operation may only be performed by System Administrators.

This operation requires an Account View Criteria value.

This operation returns an Account View Results value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the requesting User does not have permissions to the requested Account Data or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Retrieves the Account Data value associated with the given Account ID. Accounts represent customer organizations who wish to provide resources and users within a forum in order to allow users to reserve those resources.

Note: This operation may only be performed by System Administrators.

This operation returns an Account Data value.

responseMessages.message:
Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: Integer SYSID of the account being updated
parameters.name: sysidAccount

operations.notes:
Update a new Account using the given account data value. Accounts represent customers who wish to provide resources and users within a forum in order to allow users to reserve those resources.

Note: This operation may only be performed by System Administrators.

This operation requires an Account Data value.

This operation returns an Account Data value.

Note: The Forum marked as the Home Forum for the Account must exist before the Account can be created.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the requesting User does not have permissions to the requested Account Data or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Account Not Found

If the Forum identified as the Home Forum of the Account cannot be found, the following exception is returnd:

  • Not Found Exception if the Forum marked as the Home Forum for the Account cannot be found.

Invalid Account Information

If the Account details submitted do not include a valid license, or uses a non-unique name or other disqualifying attribute, or if the password provided for the account does not conform to the password policy required by the Home Forum, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Account Forum Exception if the Account details cannot be validated.
  • Password Exception if the Account password does not conform to the Home Forum password policy.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Creates a new Resource Attribute Type within the User's home Account. A Resource Attribute Type provides sub type information for Resource Attribute values.

Rights Required: The user must be a SystemAdmin

This operation requires a Resource Attribute Type value to create within the system.

This operation returns a Resource Attribute Type.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Invalid Resource Attribute Type

If the Resource Attribute Type provided does not have a unique Name value, the following exception is returned:

  • Duplication Exception if the Resource Attribute Type name is not unique.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Updates an existing Resource Attribute Type within the User's home Account. A Resource Attribute Type provides sub type information for Resource Attribute values.

Rights Required: The user must be a SystemAdmin

This operation requires a Resource Attribute Type value to update within the system.

This operation returns a Resource Attribute Type.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Resource Attribute Type Not Found

If a matching Resource Identity Type cannot be found, the following exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the Resource Attribute Type is not found.

Invalid Resource Attribute Type

If the Resource Attribute Type provided does not have a unique Name value, the following exception is returned:

  • Duplication Exception if the Resource Attribute Type name is not unique.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Create a User Attribute value for the home Account of the requesting User identified by the User Authentication Token. A User Attribute describes additional custom attributes for a User profile that are not pre-defined attributes within the AgilQuest system.

Rights Required: The user must be a SystemAdmin

Note: The user must either be the SystemAdmin, or the user's HomeAccount must be the ForumOwner.

This operation requires a User Attribute value.

This operation returns a User Attribute value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the requesting User does not have permissions to manage the Account, or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Invalid User Attribute

If the Name value of the User Attribute is not unique among all User Attributes for the User's Account, the following exception is returned:

  • Duplication Exception if the Name of the User Attribute is not unique.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Updates an existing User Attribute value for the home Account of the requesting User identified by the User Authentication Token. A User Attribute describes additional custom attributes for a User profile that are not pre-defined attributes within the AgilQuest system.

Rights Required: The user must be a SystemAdmin

Note: The user must either be the SystemAdmin, or the user's HomeAccount must be the ForumOwner.

This operation requires a User Attribute value.

This operation returns a User Attribute value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the requesting User does not have permissions to manage the Account, or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

User Attribute Not Found

If the pre-existing User Attribute being updated cannot be found in the system, the following exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the User Attribute to be udpated cannot be found.

Invalid User Attribute

If the Name value of the User Attribute is not unique among all User Attributes for the User's Account, the following exception is returned:

  • Duplication Exception if the Name of the User Attribute is not unique.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Creates a new Resource Attribute within the User's home Account. A Resource Attribute describes additional custom attributes for a Resource that are not pre-defined attributes within the AgilQuest system.

Rights Required: The user must be a SystemAdmin

This operation requires a Resource Attribute value to create within the system.

This operation returns a Resource Attribute.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Invalid Resource Attribute

If the Resource Attribute provided does not have a unique Name value, the following exception is returned:

  • Duplication Exception if the Resource Attribute name is not unique.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Updates an existing Resource Attribute within the User's Home Forum. A Resource Attribute describes additional custom attributes for a Resource that are not pre-defined attributes within the AgilQuest system.

Rights Required: The user must be a SystemAdmin

This operation requires a Resource Attribute value to update within the system.

This operation returns a Resource Attribute.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Resource Attribute Not Found

If a matching Resource Attribute cannot be found, the following exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the Resource Attribute is not found.

Invalid Resource Attribute

If the Resource Attribute provided does not have a unique Name value, the following exception is returned:

  • Duplication Exception if the Resource Attribute name is not unique.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Create a new Resource Category within the User's associated account.

Rights Required: The user must be a SystemAdmin

This operation requires a Resource Category value.

This operation returns the created Resource Category.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Invalid Resource Category

If the Resource Category is already defined, the following exception is returned:

  • Duplicate Exception if the Resource Category already exists.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Updates an existing Resource Category within the User's associated account.

Rights Required: The user must be a SystemAdmin

This operation requires a Resource Category value.

This operation returns the updated Resource Category.

Note: Any changes to existing categories will affect future reservations made with any resources of that category, but do not affect any pre-existing reservations.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Resource Category Not Found

If the Resource Category with a matching System ID for the provided value cannot be found, the following exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the Resource Category cannot be found.

Invalid Resource Category

If the Resource Category is already defined, the following exception is returned:

  • Duplicate Exception if a Resource Category with the same name value already exists.
  • Resource Exception if the modified category is a different Resource Category Type from the original category.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Creates a new Contact Type which may be used to identify how a User may be contacted, e.g. cell phone number or pager. The Contact Types are defined within the Home Forum of the requesting User's Account.

Rights Required: The user must be a SystemAdmin

This operation requires a Contact Type value.

This operation returns a Contact Type value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the requesting User does not have permissions to create Contact Types, or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Invalid Contact Type

If the provided Contact Type has a non-unique name, the following exception is returned:

  • Duplicate Exception if the Contact Type name is not unique.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Updates an existing Contact Type which may be used to identify how a User may be contacted, e.g. cell phone number or pager. The Contact Types are defined within the Home Forum of the requesting User's Account.

Rights Required: The user must be a SystemAdmin

This operation requires a Contact Type value.

This operation returns a Contact Type value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the requesting User does not have permissions to update Contact Types, or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Contact Type Not Found

If the Contact Type identified cannot be found, the following exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the Contact Type cannot be found.

Invalid Contact Type

If the provided Contact Type has a non-unique name, the following exception is returned:

  • Duplicate Exception if the Contact Type name is not unique.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Create a new Credentials Type used for authenticating a User into agilquest system. An example would be a card reader credentials type that uses a card reader to scan a User's authenticating credentials.

Rights Required: The user must be a SystemAdmin

This operation requires a Credentials Type value.

This operation returns a Credentials Type value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the requesting User does not have permissions to create Credential Types, or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

Invalid Credential Type

If the provided Credential Type has a non-unique name, the following exception is returned:

  • Duplicate Exception if the Credential Type is not unique.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

This operation returns a Credentials Type value.

responseMessages.message:

Invalid Credential Type

If the provided Credential Type has a non-unique name, the following exception is returned:

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:

Rights Required: The user must be a SystemAdmin

This operation requires a Currency Type value to create within the system.

This operation returns a Currency Type.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Currency Type Not Found

If a matching Currency Type cannot be found, the following exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the Currency Type is not found.

Invalid Currency Type

If the Currency Type provided does not have a unique Name value, the following exception is returned:

  • Duplication Exception if the Currency Type name is not unique.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

  • Duplication Exception if the Currency Type name is not unique.

Creates a new Resource Identity Type within the User's home account. A Resource Idenity Type is used as part of a Resource Identity value to uniquely identify a Resource.

Rights Required: The user must be a SystemAdmin

This operation requires a Resource Identity Type value to create within the system.

This operation returns a Resource Identity Type.

Rights Required: The user must be a SystemAdmin

This operation requires a Resource Identity Type value to create within the system.

This operation returns a Resource Identity Type.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

parameters.description: : {@link AuthTokens} - validate and identify the user making the request
parameters.name: _authTokens

operations.notes:
This operation creates a new Locator Image Type within the system which represents a Resource state. For example, there may exist a hotspot locator image type which represents an 'unavailable' state, indicating that the resource which the hotspot locator image represents is not available.

This operation requires a Locator Image Type value.

This operation returns a Locator Image Type value.

Note: This is a system management only method and, as such, requires the requestor to be the SystemAdmin.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to manage locator images, or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Invalid Locator Image Type

If the name for the Locator Image Type is not unique, the following exception is returned:

  • Duplicate Exception if the name is not unique for the LocatorImageType.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

parameters.description: : {@link AuthTokens} - validate and identify the user making the request
parameters.name: _authTokens

operations.notes:
This operation updates an existing Locator Image Type within the system which represents a Resource state. For example, there may exist a hotspot locator image type which represents an 'unavailable' state, indicating that the resource which the hotspot locator image represents is not available.

This operation requires a Locator Image Type value.

This operation returns a Locator Image Type value.

Note: This is a system management only method and, as such, requires the requestor to be the SystemAdmin.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to manage locator images, or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Locator Image Type Not Found

If the locator image type identified for this operation cannot be found, the following exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the Locator Image or Locator Image Type cannot be found.

Invalid Locator Image Type

If the name for the Locator Image Type is not unique, the following exception is returned:

  • Duplicate Exception if the name is not unique for the LocatorImageType.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
This operation creates a new Resource Locator Image for the Locator Image Type provided using the image file provided.

This operation requires a Multipart Form Data value which includes the following parts:

Part Name Description
file Byte Array file contents of image used for resource locator image.
sysidLocatorImageType Integer SYSID value of the Locator Image Type to which this resource locator corresponds.

Note: This is a system management only method and, as such, requires the requestor to be the SystemAdmin.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to manage locator images, or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Locator Image Type Not Found

If the locator image type identified for this operation cannot be found, the following exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the Locator Image or Locator Image Type cannot be found.

Invalid Locator Image

If the image provided is not unique for the Locator Image Type, the following exception is returned:

  • Duplicate Exception if the image source is not unique for the LocatorImageType.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Updates a {@link LocatorImage}.
The image source is required, and must be unique for the LocatorImageType, or a DuplicateException is thrown.
If the original LocatorImage is not found, throws a NotFoundException

Note: This is a system management only method and, as such, requires the requestor to be the SystemAdmin.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the User does not have permissions to manage locator images, or the User Authentication Token is invalid, one of the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Locator Image Not Found

If the locator image or locator image type identified for this operation cannot be found, the following exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the Locator Image or Locator Image Type cannot be found.

Invalid Locator Image

If the image provided is not unique for the Locator Image Type, the following exception is returned:

  • Duplicate Exception if the image source is not unique for the LocatorImageType.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Creates a Role in the Agilquest system for the User's home Account. A Role is a convenient way to associate multiple AuthRuleType values with a User.

Rights Required: The user must be a SystemAdmin

This operation requires a Role value.

This operation returns a Role value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the requesting User does not have permissions to manage the User's account, or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Role Not Found

If Role identified by the System ID cannot be found, the following exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the Role cannot be found.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Updates an existing Role in the Agilquest system for the User's home Account. A Role is a convenient way to associate multiple AuthRuleType values with a User.

Rights Required: The user must be a SystemAdmin

This operation requires a Role value.

This operation returns a Role value.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized User

If the requesting User does not have permissions to manage the User's account, or the User Authentication Token is invalid, the following exceptions are returned:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Role Not Found

If Role identified by the System ID cannot be found, the following exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the Role cannot be found.

Invalid Role Name

If the Name value for the Role is not unique among all Roles for this account, the following exception is thrown:

  • Duplicate Exception if the Role name is not unique.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception is returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Create a new Resource Type for use with the Resource Category values within the User's home account.

A Resource Type describes a sub type of resource within a Resource Category. E.g., for a Conference Room Resource Category, there may be three types of resources - Small, Medium, and Large conference rooms.

Rights Required: The user must be a SystemAdmin

This operation requires a Resource Type value.

This operation returns the created Resource Type.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Resource Category Not Found

If the Resource Category with a matching System ID for the provided value within the submitted Resource Type value cannot be found, the following exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the Resource Category cannot be found.

Invalid Resource Category

If the Resource Type name is already defined, the following exception is returned:

  • Duplicate Exception if a Resource Type with the same name value already exists.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
Update an existing Resource Type for use with the Resource Category values within the User's home account.

A Resource Type describes a sub type of resource within a Resource Category. E.g., for a Conference Room Resource Category, there may be three types of resources - Small, Medium, and Large conference rooms.

Rights Required: The user must be a SystemAdmin

This operation requires a Resource Type value.

This operation returns the updated Resource Type.

responseMessages.message:
Unauthorized Request

The application returns an Unauthorized Request response in the following cases:

  • Authentication Exception if the requestor cannot be authenticated using the provided Authentication token.
  • Authorization Exception if the requestor identified by the Authorization token is not authorized to perform this action.

Resource Category Not Found

If the Resource Category with a matching System ID for the provided value within the submitted Resource Type value cannot be found, or the original Resource Type for the submitted Resource Type is not found, the following exception is returned:

  • Not Found Exception if the Resource Category or Resource Type cannot be found.

Invalid Resource Category

If the Resource Type name is already defined, the following exception is returned:

  • Duplicate Exception if a Resource Type with the same name value already exists.
  • Resource Exception If the modified Resource Type is associated with a different Resource Category.

Unrecoverable Error

A System Exception if an returned if the operation has caused an unrecoverable state.

operations.notes:
